reviews.review: Muito mais bonito que os Cs anteriores, mas perde no gameplay.
Absolutely the best FPS with the greatest gameplay freedom ever !
WHERE IS NOT SKIN THERE IS NOT SKILL. DOTA 2 IS BETTER!

This game is a lot of fun and it's a game that has plenty of servers and each server has it's own community and game type and my oh my it's just an insane ammount of fun. I haven't put much time into simply because I have the newer copy of this game but if this game goes on sale it's most definitely worth the buy.
awsome add me if ur a swedish gamer ;_;
Fun Casual Game to play. Hit Boxes a little off. 7/10 Potatoes.
очень хорошая игра тем кому не понравился движок игры, играйте в 1.6 или CS:GO
It's simply just a very nice game my friends :)
Amazing game. This is what most multiplayer FPS games should be.

The following is actual dialogue used by Counter-Terrorist Units (according to this game)

I'm gonna camp A.
Roger that.
I'll go with you.
I'm gonna came B.
I'll go with you.
I'm gonna watch Bombsite B.
Affirmative.
Where are they?
Middle. He's got the bomb.
Arhghehghg (Death sounds)
Need help (gets his head blown off)
I'm coming.
*Bomb has been planted*
Bomb's at B.
Roger that.
uughghghgh (Death sounds) 
*Bomb goes off*
B.
*Terrorists win*

ITS A DECENT GAME FOR LOW END GAMING RIGS, HOWEVER ITS FLODDED WITH CHEATERS AND THE CLIENT TO SERVER REGISTRATION IS HORRIBLE THE GAME IS A SPRAY AND PRAY TYPE GAME NO AIM OR SKILL REQUIRED, IF YOU WANT A REAL FIRST PERSON WITH REALISTIC HITBOXES AND ACCURAT REGISTRATION SPEND YOUR MONEY ON COUNTERSTRIKE GLOBAL OFFENSIVE BE WARNED YOU MUST AIM AND CANT SPRAY AND PRAY! SO IF YOU LOVE SOURCE ALREADY YOU WILL PROBABLY NOT LIKE CSGO, BUT IF YOU LOVE 1.6 COMEON MAN UPGRADE YOUR GRAPHICS GET CSGO
El clásico. Muchas horas y mucha diversión. Ahora no creo que merezca la pena pillarselo, su etapa de explendor ya pasó. Un juego del que nunca te olvidarás.

After reading the reviews i decided to write my own. I find it funny how all the neg reviews say go is better. Imo go blows dick and is the worst cs ever made. Gun sounds suck, Hitboxes are worse then 1.5, The amount of trolls are worse then LoL+WoW combined. 

Css has amazing community if you get accepted into it, It has been around for a very long time and i havent been bored with it yet. Love the guns and the realization of one hit kills since u know if u get hit in the head with almost any gun odds are you will die.

игра шик,в cs go поиграл и понял что не то
игра 10/8 графика конечно не важна,но читаки бесят
из за этого 1 бал.2 бал снял за звук,в шутере это решает а если его нету как в этой игре это уже не шутер!
Супер , игра играю с огромным желанием !

Counter-Strike: Source:

An die Grafik muss man sich eben gewöhnen, aber der Spielspaßfaktor ist wirklich groß. Neben Deathmatch und Sprengkommando, ermöglicht dieses Spiel eine große Auswahl an weiteren Spielmodis. Jailbreak, Minigames, High and Seek usw. Ein wirklich sehr zu empfehlendes Spiel. Wer etwas Geld sparen möchte sollte warten bis es heruntergesetz ist. 20 Euro sind für das Spiel zwar OK, aber Counter Strike ist sehr oft heruntergesetzt. (Summer Sale, Winter-Sale)

Auf geht´s testet was das Zeug hält!
JA jeg vil gerne anbefale dette spil til alle i universet!
I like the part where u jump on squares and ruin your wrist

I love the game, It is just not something you should buy if you have no idea how to play the game. I jumped into it thinking I could be alright, but I was sorely mistaken. if you are a noob to counter strike, You should just play with bots or something along those lines.

Still a good game, Just not for casual gamers.

Ehh, basically CS 1.6 with better graphics/CS:GO with shitter graphics but it costs 5-10 bucks more.
I bought this game for the Gmod textures as well. What else is new?

I have no idea how good global offensive is but by now your either getting this for garry's mod or got it in the valve complete pack so yeah.

Although GO is around, this still is well worth the money!

Its kinda buggy. I played on a server this one time and some terrorists had CT skins on. 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=153930915

There are other glitches like being able to see through smoke that I'm sure people still abuse, or glitches like turning around a corner and having objects and player models being invisible for a few seconds before popping up after being off screen.

Its full of hackers and people who got the game for free off some torrent site so never expect to play a fair game and just expect a ton of viruses from any server you might join.

You can dodge bullets by throwing your weapons at your opponent. 10/10 would buy again.
